itemDisplayName: Deployment of N VMs running Apache (port 80) and iperf3 (port 5201) behind a Load Balancer and N VM in a backend network using the same IP address for the outbound traffic.
description: This template allows you to deploy N VMs running Apache (port 80) and iperf3 (port 5201) behind a Load Balancer and N VM in a backend network using the same IP address for the outbound traffic.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys Debian VMs, using the latest patched version.
